Title: [Abundance](https://bookshop.org/a/113618/9781668023488) (Hardcover)
Author: Ezra Klein & Derek Thompson
Synopsis: From bestselling authors and journalistic titans Ezra Klein and Derek Thompson, Abundance is a once-in-a-generation, paradigm-shifting call to renew a politics of plenty, face up to the failures of liberal governance, and abandon the chosen scarcities that have deformed American life.
